description: Episode of Series "Growing Up". Wendy has her pregnancy terminated by abortion and the film reveals some of her reactions, her boyfriend's and those of her mother to this situation. The film concludes with Wendy emphasising the importance of communications in teenage relationships. Cinemaphotography by Dean Semler. Suitable for upper secondary level.
